Although both options are hypothetical, I believe the choice reflects the principles I study. Choosing the 'Right' option, while forgoing a larger personal gain, aligns with a desire to reduce inequality and distribute resources more evenly, reflecting a value system that appreciates fairness and avoids exacerbating disparities, even in a hypothetical situation. The experience of studying injustices in the past impacts my behaviour and my preference today.
